==== Jockey (A.K.A. Restricted Manager) ====

Jockey is a means to enable hardware drivers that can not be enabled by default these include Nvidia, Ati/Amd and some broadcom.

'''Tests to perform'''

** Depending on hardware you should get a notification window appear saying there are drivers available.  Click on the icon to enable them.
** You can try running Jockey from the '''System -> Administration -> Hardware Drivers''' too.
** Try enabling support for a driver reboot when requested see if it has worked.
** Once you have rebooted try disabling the driver and rebooting.
